display_long_description:
Enter the chaotic and fun world of **Animal Company**, where survival meets pure chaos in this multiplayer VR adventure. Whether you’re exploring eerie environments, customizing your character in the Lab, or braving the terrors that await you and your friends, the excitement never stops. With **weekly updates**, there’s always something fresh to experience. 

# Why Players Love Animal Company:
- **Fun & Chaotic Multiplayer Adventures:** Whether solo or in public/private lobbies, explore caves, sewers, and forests with friends, collecting loot and outwitting creatures along the way.
- **Animal Lab Customizer**: Fully customize your character, choose from different animals, and equip a wide range of cosmetics. Limited-time bundles drop regularly too, so be on the lookout for exclusive looks to help you stand out!
- **New Weekly Content**: Fresh updates drop every week, delivering new challenges, cosmetics, and environments to keep the adventure going.	
- **Terrifyingly Unique Monsters:** Each environment is filled with monsters that will leave you on edge, ensuring no two encounters are ever the same.

Be sure to join thousands of Animals in the Discord updates, challenges, giveaways and sneak peaks! Discord.gg/AnimalCompany

Join Animal Company today for thrilling, unpredictable adventures filled with danger, scares, and fun.
